document_data.mainbody:
Sunrun was a famous dwarven drinking song. Its name was a Dwarvish word translated to "nobody" in the Common tongue.
The lively drinking songs plot was about dwarves being blamed for one bad thing after another after being caught red-handed and each time they were caught the dwarves said that "Sunrun" did it.
During the Time of Troubles, a dwarvish Harper, who went by the alias Sunrun, aided the heroes who would become gods Midnight, Cyric, and Kelemvor, during their stay at Scardale.
